name: OpenWrt LXC
description: OpenWrt running natively in LXC container - a powerful open-source firmware that provides advanced networking capabilities with full LuCI web interface support. Native implementation eliminates chroot complexity and provides complete OpenWrt functionality.

notes.text: This container requires privileged mode for network interface management and kernel module access.
Native OpenWrt implementation provides full LuCI web interface functionality without chroot limitations.
Access the LuCI web interface at http://container-ip after installation completes.
Uses native OpenWrt LXC template for minimal resource footprint (~5MB vs 500MB+ for Debian-based).
